dublinCore.dc:title: 115 HR 1460 IH: Regulatory Fingerprints Act of 2017
dublinCore.dc:rights: Pursuant to Title 17 Section 105 of the United States Code, this file is not subject to copyright protection and is in the public domain.

action.action-desc: Mr. Young of Iowa (for himself and Mr. Hensarling) introduced the following bill; which was referred to the Committee on the Judiciary

form.official-title: To require the identification of certain persons who participated in a rule making in publications related to such rule making, and for other purposes.

section.text: This Act may be cited as the Regulatory Fingerprints Act of 2017.

section.header: Required publications pertaining to rule makings
section.text: Section 553 of title 5, United States Code, is amended by adding at the end the following:

subsection.text: For all publications in the Federal Register pertaining to the rule, the agency shall include in such publicationâ€”

paragraph.text: the name and title of officer or employee of the agency who participated in the rule making, and each person performing any work pertaining to the rule making under the terms of a contract with the agency; and
the specific legal authority that authorizes the agency to make the rule.
